message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I believe it would be highly beneficial for you. Given its value, I'm proposing a price of $14,000.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. I'm willing to pay that price for the product.

Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,000 is tempting, the true value of this product is significant. I'm willing to come down slightly to $13,000.  I believe this is a fair and attractive offer.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $13,000, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $12,500. I think that's a fair price for the product.
